data_strp <- str_replace_all(html_text(data), '\n','')

# 1 = meet + date, 2 = distance, 3 = time, 4 = place

distance = list() 
time = list() 
place = list() 
k <- 1
for(i in seq(1, 40, by=4)){
  meet_name[k] = data_strp[i]
  distance[k] = data_strp[i+1]
  time[k] = data_strp[i+2]
  place[k] = data_strp[i+3]
k <- k + 1  
}
